title: Divya Lakshmi Pendant: A Touch of Divine Grace
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster. Adorned with high-quality CZ diamonds (American Diamonds) and accented with vibrant ruby (Red) and emerald (Green) simulants. Expertly crafted setting to maximize gemstone brilliance.
features: Features a finely detailed Lakshmi Devi motif at the center, embodying prosperity and blessings. The pendant showcases a traditional temple design with intricate detailing (Nakshi work inspired) and a modern adaptation with sparkling CZ stones. Delicately crafted design incorporating floral and scrollwork elements.
colors: Predominantly gold with flashes of ruby red and emerald green
complemented by the dazzling brilliance of white CZ diamonds. A classic South Indian color palette symbolizing auspiciousness.
occasions: Ideal for traditional occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and religious ceremonies. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits for parties and cultural events.
description: This pendant is a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian temple jewelry design and modern aesthetics. The Lakshmi Devi motif brings blessings and prosperity, making it an auspicious and cherished piece. Its high-quality craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a radiant and durable finish. A timeless piece that can be passed down through generations, representing cultural heritage and elegance.
